thread.title: Internet services blocked in Surat for 24 hours after Hardik Patel is detained ahead of rally
thread.title_full: Internet services blocked in Surat for 24 hours after Hardik Patel is detained ahead of rally - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Internet services blocked in Surat for 24 hours after Hardik Patel is detained ahead of rally
text: Internet services have been temporarily suspended in Surat after Patidar Ananmat Andolan Samiti convener Hardik Patel was detained ahead of Ekta Yatra. The local administration has cut off the services for 24 hours. Patel was detained along with 50 supporters from Mangadh chowk in Surat ahead of the rally, on the grounds that they did not seek permission from the authorities to take out this rally. Patel has been causing unrest in Gujarat since a few weeks demanding for a special status for the Patel community.
